item.title: How to learn Game Development
item.description: Ways to make a game Code a game from scratch using raw codding eg C++, JAVA, python etc… Use a Game Engine :bulb: Pro tip: please use a Game Engine if your goal is to make a game. don’t re-invent the wheel Whats a Game Engine? Game engines are tools available for game designers to code and plan out a game quickly and easily without building one from the ground up.
